Description: Green turned brown glazed steatite scarab: engraved on the base with two confronted uraei, a 'nfr' sign between them.
Bibliographic references: Giveon R 1985a / Egyptian scarabs from Western Asia from the collections of the British Museum (p.176, no.3)
Acquisition name: Donated by: Sir Augustus Wollaston Franks
Previous owner: Previous owner/ex-collection: Rev Greville John Chester
